html:
12.15.24  9:21 am   what if an album that's not an album is actually still an album?

      there must be some 'creative license' at play somewhere

12.15.24  9:15 am   I find it cool how distinctly recognisable each one of your songs are. How do you do it?

      i think it ultimately boils down to cold hard sentience

12.15.24  6:49 am   How do I find a good question to ask?

      how about just asking the same questions as everyone else

12.15.24  6:32 am   Any tips to avoid becoming an absolute megalomaniac after the slightest amount of success?

      a bit of failure ought to do the trick

12.15.24  3:49 am   i tend to flip flop between knowing im too weird for most people to understand (positive), and knowing im too weird for most people to understand (negative). the latter causes me to feel a deep sadness, and then i begin to think i may never be able to relate to people, or vice versa. i know this is not true, but i always have a hard time shaking it off anyway. how do i permanently get rid of my anxieties and fully harness my weird powers?

      sometimes it's a general good rule of thumb to assume that your experience is actually very widely relatable, and the fact that this aspect seems under expressed can be seen as an opportunity for you to contribute to innovation of expression for those types of things

12.15.24  2:29 am   Do you like doritos dipped in mayonnaise?

     i don't think so

      If not, why do you like watching small puppies die? 

      it's interesting you mention that, because i wouldn't enjoy that either. that would be what's known as an 'incorrect inference'

12.15.24  12:10 am   do you ever have the urge to get on all fours and bark around like a dog in the middle of the street?

      no

12.14.24  9:56 pm   what's a good emotion

      emotions are impossible to describe exactly in words, but you already did that part anyway

12.14.24  8:22 pm   what quote do you live by

      instead of living by quotes, sometimes i have quotes about life. in any case, the life drives the quotes

12.14.24  7:38 pm   have you ever slapped anyone?

      no

12.14.24  6:39 pm   how can i play stuff as fast as i hear it in my head? my mind is ahead of my chops by a lot

      maybe you could have regular social gatherings with your hands and your mind both present. after enough quality time together i really think you all will get to know each other quite well

12.14.24  5:56 pm   hey bill im a huge fan of your work and one of the things i really love about it is the production. everything always sounds very clean even when there is a lot going on. im currently writing a song with many guitar parts playing at once to create a cool ambience. any tips to mixing it so that it sounds good?

      this may seem hard to believe, but it can be actually good to have no more than 2 things actually happening at one time

12.14.24  3:35 pm   Quartermelons. Like watermelons, but they're in quarters. What do you think? 

      fine with me

12.14.24  2:57 pm   what is a cookie? are they cakes or pies? Or are they a lemon?

      a cookie is a cake i believe

12.14.24  1:58 pm   C G E Bb Db Eb Gb A (all at the same time). thoughts?

      still hundreds of unknown factors to what it sounds like. not the least of which would be which octaves for each of these

12.14.24  1:49 pm   what inspired you to make music

      in a way, it's sort of like when you are young and you see people *walking* and you're like HELLO my goodness that seems desperately useful

12.14.24  1:41 pm   Should the world be better?

      yes but that is not to imply that there was anything wrong with it before

12.14.24  1:23 pm   do you have a pet

      no

12.14.24  10:46 am   whats the title of every movie

      spider man

12.14.24  10:08 am   what if you listened to so many different kinds of albums that you can eventually find one that makes the most sense for you?

      i've sort of concluded that the results i want to get from an album would technically make it no longer an album

12.14.24  9:49 am   What was the moment when you decided that making music and/or animations is what you wanted to do?

      every now and then, when i think i see someone doing a crappy presentation, i might think think to myself "i'm looking forward to doing better presentations than this"

12.14.24  9:36 am   Gimme a script for "out to lunch"

      ok

12.14.24  7:39 am   Birds are really cool right?

      pretty much

12.14.24  6:46 am   What do you think about people who use slide-shows for their presentations, yet miss the entire point of a slide show and only read the text written in the slide ?

      basically if you think you see someone doing a crappy presentation, you can think to yourself "i'm looking forward to doing better presentations than this"

12.14.24  4:05 am   If I found a palm tree in my garden from somewhere else really far away but it's now in my garden does it become my palm tree?

      the way you described it sounds like yes, but i can't be sure of the details of the exact situation

12.14.24  3:56 am   do you think cars are sad when they are traded in for newer cars?

      no

12.14.24  12:49 am   Can i have a shoutout

      shoutouts have been found to not actually be effective

12.13.24  11:59 pm   do you do all your own music

      yes i do

12.13.24  11:51 pm   You wake up on the morning of september 11, 2001. What do you do?

      let's be honest, i went to school

12.13.24  11:41 pm   Have you considered painting yourself green and pretending to be a bush

      no

12.13.24  11:27 pm   Will Djokovic win a slam in 2025?

      that's really up to him

12.13.24  10:13 pm   is 16 tracks too much for an album? its roughly 40 ish minutes

      i've never liked an album. i know there must be a way for them to be that i would like but i haven't figured it out yet

12.13.24  10:01 pm   What is an interest of yours that you haven't exploited much or at all in your videos that you would like to implement in the not-so-distant future?
How do you think you might want to incorporate it, if you feel at liberty to say?

      how about 'measured judgement'

12.13.24  9:38 pm   what's your opinion of jazz

      you can really never be too sure who means what by the word jazz

12.13.24  8:34 pm   i make bad decisions. how to stop making bad decisions that i will immediately regret for the rest of my life? it's been like this for a little too long

      what are some good decisions you'd like to make?

12.13.24  7:30 pm   can you name a song you like?

      what happens sometimes is i name a song i like without saying it's a song i like. i'll name a song in reference to something else, while the fact that i like it goes unmentioned at that particular moment

12.13.24  7:27 pm   what is a question you coudn't have been able to answer last week, but now are able too?

ig i'm asking something you've learned this week

      i already knew the world wasn't flat but it's even less flat than i thought

12.13.24  7:02 pm   what do you like better carpet or laminate

      omg i love both so much

12.13.24  6:02 pm   do you ever collaborate with other artists? 

      heck, i can't even collaborate with myself. no just kidding, i've done it but my biggest problem is admitting it, apparently

12.13.24  5:51 pm   Will you use a theremin in a music?

      no

12.13.24  5:23 pm   pick a card?

      3 of spades

12.13.24  4:01 pm   Do you think there are any colors that we haven't discovered yet?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.13.24  3:47 pm   do you celebrate christmas?

      christmas celebrates itself

12.13.24  1:46 pm   Thoughts on quaternions?

      'a necessary evil'

12.13.24  1:41 pm   how long did it take you to write the script for perfect, and did you edit it a lot?

      it took about a day. i only edited it while i was writing it. once i reached the end there were no significant edits to the writing

12.13.24  12:57 pm   Are 3-minute songs 2-minute songs too?

      not exactly

12.13.24  12:41 pm   what is 4+4?

      2 cubed

12.13.24  10:57 am   I've been learning piano any tips

      it sounds like it's going pretty good

12.13.24  10:55 am   I would like to ask a question but i don't know what to say or where to start. Any ideas on how i could get some ideas?

      sure. you can look at what other people tend to ask, and then just ask the exact same thing

12.13.24  9:16 am   what do you think is the future of physical media?

      imagine something even more physical
